article.title: Torch Technologies to Develop Aviation and Missile Center Simulation
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Torch Technologies, Huntsville, Alabama, was awarded more than $48 million to investigate, design, develop, and evaluate a scalable simulation enterprise for the Army's Aviation and Missile Command Research, Development, and Engineering Center.Â U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
